name: jkdn-movie
description: A tailwindcss boilerplate that makes development easy.

scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "postcss src/css/tailwind.css -o dist/assets/css/main.css --watch" " node backtolocal.js "  "instant -p 4343 ./dist"
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently " postcss src/css/tailwind.css -o dist/assets/css/main.css " " node changetocdn.js "

author: Emmanuel Raymond
